name: MHTOCSMMConditionShock
title: MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Condition Shock
description: The MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Condition Shock is derived from the MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Condition Profile. This derived profile specifies an individual SMM indicator code by binding to an extension, ValueSet, and CodeSystem. There are seven ICD-10 codes specified for Shock in this profile: O75.1, R57.x, T78.2XXA, T81.10XA, T81.11XA, T81.19XA, T88.6XXA
